About Me

BIO

I've always felt an affinity for logical thinking and have always found problem solving to be a pasttime rather than a chore. I am a board game fanantic and I love learning new instructions, rules, and game structures. At the start of 2018 was when I decide I would take a leap of faith and commit to web development full time and I have not regretted it since. I enjoyed learning all the languages, wireframes, libraries and anything inbetween.

U10 Corporation Mathnasium

Center Director

As a center director, I was responsible of many adminstrative task and relation-building task. Under my leadership, the Monterey Park center had seen an increase in revenue from many factors. We have greater retention of members through community outreach programs that I put the gears into to motion.

Thinkful

Engineering Emmersion Student

As a student, I learned the best industry practies and practical software development standards with a focus on HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, React, Redux, and algorithms & data structures. I also created and deployed mobile-first applications while learning new languages, frameworks and deployment by collaborating several hours every week with a senior web developer.
